name: Command and Control - Scheduled Transfer (T1029)
description: Detects suspicious use of scheduled tasks, cron jobs, or automated scripts for periodic data exfiltration or command-and-control communication. Attackers may schedule data transfers to evade detection.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(schtasks.exe OR at.exe OR cron OR bitsadmin.exe OR powershell.exe) AND process.args:(*create* OR *add* OR *Schedule* OR *Register-ScheduledJob* OR *Start-Sleep* OR *Start-Job*)
